title: Task Manager
description: A simple and intuitive task manager web application that allows users to add, edit, and mark tasks as completed. This application provides a minimalistic interface to manage daily tasks efficiently.

title: VentureJobs
description: Welcome to VentureJobs - A web application enabling users to browse, search, and post job listings, enhancing job-seeking and hiring processes.

title: My Portfolio
description: My personal portfolio website to showcase my skills, projects, and contact details.

title: TwitterSoz
description: A web application that enables users to create, comment, like, and manage their posts and features user authentication, image uploads, and real-time notifications.

title: Jewelmender
description: A jewellery recommending web application that provides personalized jewelry recommendations based on uploaded dress images.

title: Travel Management and Tour Booking
description: An application for travel agencies to organize tours and manage bookings for flights and hotels.
